# scaleway_key_manager_decrypt (Ephemeral Resource)

The [`scaleway_key_manager_decrypt`](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/scaleway/scaleway/latest/docs/ephemeral-resource/key_manager_decrypt) ephemeral resource is helpful to decrypt a payload using an existing key.

Refer to the Key Manager [documentation](https://www.scaleway.com/en/docs/key-manager/) and [API documentation](https://www.scaleway.com/en/developers/api/key-manager/) for more information.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ciphertext` (String, Sensitive) Ciphertext data to decrypt. Data size must be between 1 and 131071 bytes.
- `key_id` (String) ID of the key to use for decryption. Can be a plain UUID or a regional ID.

### Optional

- `associated_data` (Object) Must match the associated_data value passed in the encryption request. Only supported by keys with a usage set to `symmetric_encryption`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--associated_data))
- `region` (String) Region of the key. If not set, the region is derived from the key_id when possible or from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `plaintext` (String, Sensitive) Key's decrypted data.

<a id="nestedatt--associated_data"></a>
### Nested Schema for `associated_data`

Optional:

- `value` (String)
